question: Taking into account the information outlined in the income statement, what is the FY2019 - FY2021 3 year average unadjusted operating income % margin for Corning? Answer in units of percents and round to one decimal place.
correctness_reasoning: The ground truth answer is 10.3%, and the predicted answer is 11.0%. Applying a 10% tolerance to the ground truth (10.3% ± 1.03%), the acceptable range is 9.27% to 11.33%. The predicted answer of 11.0% falls within this range, so it is considered correct.
